name: Prison
description:
You are a innocent man, who is banished to a planet for a crime you didn´t commit. The planet has been devastated by a nuclear war and is used as a galactic prison. There are rumors about a spaceship that crashed on the planet and you have to search for 8 parts of the missing escape pod in order to escape.

The game is a action-adventure with multiple interactions. You have to talk to their characters to solve puzzles, as well as fight aliens and robots.
